string.text: Make your way carefully along the streets, and watch the rooftops!

Thank you, Marked One, for your help. That was one hell of a tough battle. We'll be camping here.
Let me bring you up to date on the area. If you go back towards the transition, and then go right, you'll reach the bus station - but that's dangerously open terrain.
If you go forward, you'll find yourself in front of the hotel, right next to the Monolith headquarters.
Their base is located in the stadium. We planned to go through there to the station. That's all we know...
Thank you, for your help. Have fun!
